mutants.code:
def solve(str):
    str = str.replace(' ', '')
    (left_side, right_side) = str.split('=')
    b = int(right_side)
    (x_part, a_part) = left_side.split('+')
    a = int(a_part)
    x = b + a
    return x

def solve(str):
    str = str.replace(' ', '')
    (left_side, right_side) = str.split('=')
    b = int(right_side)
    (x_part, a_part) = left_side.split('+')
    a = int(a_part)
    x = b * a
    return x

def solve(str):
    str = str.replace('', '')
    (left_side, right_side) = str.split('=')
    b = int(right_side)
    (x_part, a_part) = left_side.split('+')
    a = int(a_part)
    x = b - a
    return x

def solve(str):
    str = str.replace(' ', 'MUTATED')
    (left_side, right_side) = str.split('=')
    b = int(right_side)
    (x_part, a_part) = left_side.split('+')
    a = int(a_part)
    x = b - a
    return x

    str = str.replace(' ', '')
